data.title: Descendants of Edward Baber & Ann Walker
data.text:
BaberFamilyTree.org

Descendants of Edward Baber & Ann Walker - Will dated 1798 Use your "Back Button" to return to the previous page.

The Last Change to this Page was August 19, 2024

Updates may Consist of Minor or Major Additions or Deletions.

Persons on this page have been Y-DNA tested. Click to see the results and relationships for R-M269 DNA Subgroup 4. They are noit known to be related to other Baber families.

DNA results are not the same as descendants of Robert the Immigrant (Virginia - 1679), nor do they link with Edward Baber and Catherine Leigh in the tomb at Chew Magna.

No. 136594, Page 27, Eighth Annual Report of Virginia State Library Board of Revolutionary Soldiers of VA.
